completed_steps.summary: Classified as multi-part with 2 parts: backend (Go/Gin) and frontend (Next.js/React)
Found 3 existing docs: root README (comprehensive), backend README (API docs), frontend README (basic)
Conditional analysis complete: Backend (30+ API endpoints, 11 tables) + Frontend (15 shadcn components, App Router structure)
Source tree analysis generated with annotations for backend (cmd, internal, pkg, migrations) and frontend (app router, components, lib, services)
Development and deployment guides created (Docker setup, testing, production deployment)
Architecture docs generated: backend (19KB), frontend (39KB), integration (24KB)
Master index created (17KB) - primary AI retrieval source
Workflow complete: 9 docs generated (183KB total), comprehensive brownfield documentation ready

user_context: Project migrated from Rust to Go backend (100% complete). NextAuth v5 integration complete. Production-ready status. Docker development environment. Excludes job scraping feature (future).

technology_stack.backend: Go 1.23, Gin, PostgreSQL, sqlx, JWT auth, golang-migrate
technology_stack.frontend: Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript, shadcn/ui, NextAuth v5, Tailwind CSS

architecture_patterns.frontend: Next.js App Router with component-based architecture

findings.project_classification: Multi-part, 2 parts, Go backend + Next.js frontend
